slideshow.heading: Sauvage Deodorant Stick
slideshow.content: The Dior Sauvage Deodorant Stick features a subtly scented alcohol-free formula that reveals the fresh and woody notes of Sauvage. Gentle lasting protection that is soft on skin.

slideshow.heading: Beard Grooming Kit
slideshow.content: Jack Black's Beard Grooming Kit is a 4-step beard care routine that features everything needed to cleanse, condition, soften, and style.

slideshow.heading: BLEU DE CHANEL After Shave Lotion
slideshow.content: BLEU DE CHANEL After Shave Lotion refreshes and softens. Skin feels comfortable and is lightly scented with the profoundly sensual fragrance.
